question: Find the correct adverb for the words underlined: The thunder struck and <u>at the same time</u>, the electric charge went off.
Report the sentence given below: Raju asked, 'Can I help you'?
options: Raju wanted to know if he could help me
Raju asked me whether he can help me
Raju inquired me that how can he help me
Raju asked how could he help me
answer: Raju wanted to know if he could help me

question: Change into Reported Speech: I will come to your party tomorrow.
options: I said that I would come to his party the next day
I said that I will come to his party the next day
I said that I will be coming to his party tomorrow
I said that I will come to his party tomorrow
answer: I said that I would come to his party the next day

question: Change into Passive voice: Had the thieves stolen anything?
options: Had anything been stolen by the thieves?
Anything had been stolen by the thieves?
answer: Had anything been stolen by the thieves?

question: Who taught you to sing?
options: By whom you taught to sing?
By whom was you taught to sing?
By whom were you taught to sing?
By whom were you have been taught to sing?
answer: By whom were you taught to sing?
